name: 張元震
objective:
先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於 IC 製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC 絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC 技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

Week 1	導論 (Introduction)
Week 2	積體電路生產簡介 (Introduction of IC process)
Week 3	半導體材料 (Semiconductor Materials)
Week 4	半導體材料 (Semiconductor Materials)
Week 5	晶圓製造 (Wafer Fabrication Process)
Week 6	熱製程 (Thermal Processing)
Week 7	微影製程 (Lithography)
Week 8	微影製程 (Lithography)
Week 9	蝕刻 (Etching) / Mid-term Exam
Week 10	蝕刻 (Etching)
Week 11	離子佈植 (Ion Implantation)
Week 12	離子佈植 (Ion Implantation)
Week 13	物理氣相沉積 (PVD)
Week 14	物理氣相沉積 (PVD)

Week 16	化學氣相沉積 (CVD)
